string-array.item: Write down anything going on in your lifeâ€” things you are worried about, the stressors weighing you down, or everything in between. Like magic, this calms your mind down and releases your negative thoughts.
By stopping to take a deep breath, your heart rate slows, and more oxygen enters your bloodstream. This communicates to your brain to relax. Taking a deep breath can improve the quality of your day.
Take out your paintbrush and let go of the problems troubling your mind. Unwind and find your groove; anyone can be an artist when they use their creativity!
Walking outside releases endorphins that stimulate relaxation and improve your mood! Enjoying the fresh air and nature is a moment in your day to relax and find gratitude.
